attributes.action: Ban anyone from dating sites with a Claire’s law
attributes.additional_details: Online dating has become one of the most common ways for people to meet potential partners. While it offers opportunities for connection and companionship, it can also expose users to serious risks — especially when known abusers are allowed to use these platforms anonymously and without restriction.By enacting this legislation, the government can take a vital step in safeguarding vulnerable individuals and holding platforms responsible for the safety of their users.
attributes.background: To be able to ban anyone with a background of violence/ harassment from dating sites

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730251
